Title: Tally Marks for Windows Phone 7
Description: Tally Marks is a counting application.  It can count almost anything you'd like to count, and it does it with tally marks!  Count the number of people at your party, the number of steps from your hotel room to the conference meeting room, or anything else that needs counting.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Tally Marks is a counting application. It can count almost anything you'd like to count, and it does it with tally marks! Count the number of people at your party, the number of steps from your hotel room to the conference meeting room, or anything else that needs counting.
  • Your tally marks match your phone accent color
  • Track your count with tally marks and a numeric counter
  • Easily increment and decrement your count

Download and install the Windows Phone 7 development tools from http://developer.windowsphone.com.

Find Tally Marks on the Windows Phone Marketplace at http://social.zune.net/redirect?type=phoneApp&id=827d311b-c1e7-df11-9264-00237de2db9e
